segments.text: Could you show me the T-shirt on the model ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . We have three different colors , white , blue and pink .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you make it any cheaper ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll take it if you give me a discount .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: $ 10 . That's the best I can do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'll take the blue one .
segments.speaker: S1
